Title: Admin retrieves all products with full details and inventory status
Description: Validate that an admin user can successfully retrieve the complete product list, including all required fields and inventory status.
Acceptance_Criteria: Each product includes: id, name, description, price, category, stockQuantity.
Inventory status is accurate for all products.
Products marked inactive/removed are not present.
Test_Steps: Confirm all fields and inventory status are present.
Expected_Result: All products and their inventory status are returned as per schema.

Title: Admin adds a new product with full details
Description: Ensure admin can create a new product with all mandatory and optional fields, including images.
Acceptance_Criteria: All fields (name, description, price, category, images) match the request.
Inventory status is set as per stockQuantity.
Test_Steps: Send POST /api/products with valid ProductRequest payload.
Validate response and new product existence.
Expected_Result: Product is created and details are stored correctly.

Title: Admin updates product details
Description: Validate that an admin can update all editable fields of an existing product.
Acceptance_Criteria: Fields are updated as per the request.

Title: Admin removes a product (soft/hard delete)
Description: Ensure that an admin can delete a product, either marking it inactive or removing it from the database.
Acceptance_Criteria: Response returns 200 OK or 204 No Content.
Product is not returned in GET /api/products.
Product status is set as inactive or deleted.
Expected_Result: Product is not visible in product listing.

Title: Admin updates inventory and availability
Description: Ensure admin can update stockQuantity and product availability.

Title: Admin searches for products by query
Description: Validate search functionality for name, description, and category.

Title: Admin filters products by category
Description: Validate that category filter returns only products in the specified category.
Acceptance_Criteria: All products belong to the category.
Expected_Result: Only products in specified category are returned.

Title: Validate field constraints (min/max lengths, required fields, min values)
Description: Ensure API rejects invalid product data on create/update.
Acceptance_Criteria: Response returns 400 Bad Request with meaningful ErrorResponse.
Error details specify the invalid fields.
Test_Steps: POST/PUT with name/description exceeding max length.
POST/PUT with duplicate name (if not allowed).
Expected_Result: API rejects invalid data with clear error messages.

Title: Unauthorized user attempts CRUD operations
Description: Only authenticated admins can manage products.
Test_Steps: Perform POST/PUT/DELETE without auth or with non-admin user.

Title: Security â€“ Input validation for injection
Description: Ensure API is resilient against SQL injection and malicious payloads.
Acceptance_Criteria: API does not execute injected SQL.
Test_Steps: POST/PUT with SQL injection strings in fields.

Title: Excessive API calls are throttled
Description: API enforces rate limits or returns 429.
Acceptance_Criteria: API returns 429 Too Many Requests after threshold.
Test_Steps: Rapidly send requests to an endpoint.

Title: Large product list and payloads
Description: Validate API handles large product lists and payload sizes.
Acceptance_Criteria: API returns results within acceptable time.
